document_data.name: ''Delryn Family Shield''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Delryn family shield''''' was an [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[medium shield]] that was an heirloom passed down within the noble [[Delryn]] family of [[Amn]].
document_data.Powers: This ''+1 medium shield'' radiated a [[magic]]al aura that protected its wielder from both fire and cold. Three times per day, the shield generated an energy shield that deflected normal projectiles and missiles as per the [[spell]], ''[[protection from arrows]]''.
document_data.History: This weapon once belonged to [[Cor Delryn|Lord Cor Delryn]] and was passed down to his son [[Anomen Delryn|Anomen]].
